title: Updating  Firefox current version of software
content: I received a msg from Mozilla that my Firefox was out of date and to download current version. I downloaded the current version but it does not update. I went to the menue and firefox help and it said automatic downloads disabled by system adminiestrator, I'm running linux mint. How do I get the download to update?

title: Youtube tabs randomly start playing
content:
So yea I've noticed opened Youtube tabs will just randomly start the video playing while I'm in another tab, it's really annoying. I've tried disabling all extensions but it continues to happen. Anyone know whats going on, it's been happening for a really long time.

Using Windows 11 Firefox version 133.0.

title: Firefox now working on some sites.
content:
This issue seems to be getting worse as time goes on. I have to go to another browser to use Cabella's, Nextdoor, and several others. sometimes I get bad request when using a link or in the case of Cabela's I can not navigate their site. Lately I have been getting a warning of dangerous site when I hit the link in an email for all the forums that I belong to.

I love Firefox's bookmark system, other wise I would just use another browser, but I'm hoping you can correct these issues for me.

Thanks, Jim Roney (long time user)

title: Issue with high disk usage - \Mozilla\xul.dll after wake from hibernate
content:
Win7x64p, FF 115.18.0esr (64-bit) When I power on my Dell E6440 from hibernate (& restart?), with or without some small portable apps running -Total Commander, notepad. I have to wait (sometimes 5 minutes or more) before I can use without significant lag. HDD LED full-on. If I start up FF while disk usage is very high, sometimes 1 core of CPU gets stuck at 100%. Sleep & wake resets this. Watching in Resource Monitor \Mozilla\xul.dll using high disk B/sec & HDD LED full on, when HDD LED returns normal xul.dll disk read activity drops to 0 or near.

Is a FF service/process reading its stored data?(via xul.dll) or something. Looking for any ideas to troubleshoot.

I'm not having any issues with FireFox running, just this process making PC unusable after wake-up. Thanks
creator: tonigau
